marklogic.body: Thanks for the comment. I'll read your article. I'm actually reading that Quiet book now. I do understand that some people get energy from being around others, but even extroverts have to put their head down and work. No one pays for people to talk, unless your a speaker or a phone rep. I "cowork" a lot with friends, and I love being with them. But, I only do it with the ones I know won't distract me. Many of them are extroverts, but they also believe in doing real work. I can't do coworking Spots because I can't control who I'll be working with and Ensure they have my same dedication to getting work done.
